author: Gino D'Acampo
method: Blitz the raspberries and icing sugar together in a food processor.  Pour the raspberry purée, through a sieve into a mixing bowl. In another mixing bowl whip the double cream with the icing sugar and stir the pistachio nuts through the mixture. Fold the raspberry purée into the cream and spoon into a tall dessert glass. Garnish with two seasonal edible flowers, if using, and serve chilled.
ingredients: 100g/3½oz fresh raspberries,  1 tbsp icing sugar,  150ml/5¼fl oz double cream,  1 tbsp icing sugar,  2 tbsp pistachios, crushed,  2 seasonal, edible flowers (optional)
